item.title: Michael Mann to Receive Lumiere Award at 17th Edition of Thierry Fremaux’s Lumiere Festival
item.description: Michael Mann is set to receive the Lumiere Award at the 17th edition of the Lumière Festival in Lyon this fall. The festival, headed by Cannes chief Thierry Fremaux, celebrates classic films and honor
